name: ArchVis Apt A
description:
ArchVis Apartment.

Developer
  • My Apps: Brad App List
  • My YouTube Channel: Brad Code Tips
Features
  • Maps: Lobby, Room (Day), Room (Night), Room (Outage)
  • Working TV 
  • Movie (www.bigbuckbunny.org)
  • City Ambient Sound FX
  • Flythrough 
  • VR

Off Description
  • ArchVisAptA is version A of an Architectural Visualization (ArchVis) of a room of an apartment.
  • Why buy or rent when you can download your very own apartment for free.
Directions
  • Press Esc to get back to the Lobby.
Notes
  • VR should work; however, I could not test it because I don't have a VR headset.
Version 1.0
  • No known bugs
Technical
  • Unreal Engine Version 4.23
Design
  • This game is based on Unreal Engine 4 Realistic Rendering.
  • I added a working TV to make the environment more realistic.
  • I only included one movie because I wanted to keep the download size small.
Feedback

What did you like or dislike? Any feedback is appreciated.

Install Instructions

Download the ZIP file, unzip, and run the EXE file. No install is required.
